name: Help Me GROW! (Ludum Dare) [1 Hour]
description:
| Description |

You are an astronaut who got a distress call from an alien planet, help the little alien grow in 60 seconds!
This is my Ludum Dare entry... For one hour! I was very late, so I started one hour before the end of the Ludum Dare 46 submissions ended, however, when I was exporting my game I checked the website and it said 3 minutes and I was terrified, but I refreshed and it said 56 minutes, the most terrifying thing ever.

(also, my first gamejam, yay!)
